records.location_details: Incident occurred during the pre-departure phase of a Joint Return Operation at an airport facility, specifically in a body-search room and waiting area.
records.where_clear: Airport facility during pre-departure phase of a return operation
records.location_text_raw: Return Operation to [redacted] and Joint Return Operation to [redacted] and [redacted], at the airport
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location details (country, city) are redacted. The incident occurred within an airport facility during the pre-departure phase of a return operation.

possible_violations.legal_basis: art.1 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights
art. 2 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights

possible_violations.violation_name: Prohibition of torture and inhuman or degrading treatment or punishment
possible_violations.legal_basis: art. 4 of the EU Charter of Fundamental Rights

records.context_note: During a pre-departure body check for a return operation, an escort officer from an organizing Member State allegedly pressed a restrained returnee's neck with his boot. The action caused visible discomfort and ceased upon a Monitor's entry. No visible injuries were reported, but the Fundamental Rights Office concluded it was excessive force and a violation of fundamental rights, citing potential serious health risks including asphyxiation. The same escort was involved in a previous incident where he allegedly slapped a returnee.
records.evidence_quote: An escort officer from the organizing Member State allegedly pressed the returnee's neck with his boot, causing visible discomfort.
